name: Elonkorjuu - Live Harvest
description:
It's august and it's time to harvest the crop.

Too bad your teeth fell off back in 1985, so you are stuck hunting with only your trusty and rusty sickle.

Your goal is to hunt every living thing inside the level and go back to sleep inside your cozy coffin. Beware of lighted spaces as you are allergic to light.

Controls

WASD - Move
SPACE - Dash
LMB - Attack
ESCAPE - Quit (if you dare)
PGUP/PGDOWN - Change mouse sensitivity
M - Mute music

Level Editor

You can add .txt files inside the 'Levels' folder to make additional levels.

The files must be named 'levelnumber.txt'
eg. 0.txt, that will be the first level.

Level editor places the chosen objects by IDs based on their location in the .txt file

Each row must start with a number and end with a comma ( , ) And between each number there must a comma aswell.

Each level must have a player spawn point, level exit and atleast 1 enemy/npc.

eg.
22, 22, 22, 22,
22, 22, 22, 22,
This will spawn 2 lines of floors with 2x2 (meter) snapping.

ID Sheet

10. Player Spawn Point
11. NPC_180_Back
12. NPC_90_Right
13. Enemy_180_Back
14. Enemy_90_Right
15. Level Exit

20-27 Floors
30-35 Blockers (Triggers that are used to turn enemies/npcs when they collide with them)
40-52 Walls
Wall IDs
Floor IDs
